dct_title_s: Map of Central America, Cuba, Porto Rico, and the islands of the Caribbean Sea
dct_alternative_sm: Map of Central America, Cuba, Porto Rico, and the islands of the Caribbean Sea
dct_description_sm: Also shows distances between major cities.; Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by contours and gradient tints.; "Copyright ... by American Bank Note Company, New York."; Includes inset of Canal Zone and relief profile of Panama Canal, and note, in red, about the Pan American Union's distribution responsibilities in the lower right margin.
